home_description: ShopWise helps you understand your family's consumption, save money, and never forget an item on your shopping list again.
powerful_features_description: Everything you need to manage your family's purchases efficiently.
feature_visual_insights_description: Track your spending with intuitive charts and make smarter decisions.
feature_camera_register_description: Simply scan the receipt's QR code, and our AI takes care of the rest.
feature_smart_lists_description: Receive AI-powered suggestions and never forget essential items again.
feature_full_control_description: Manage your family, your preferences, and your data with total freedom and privacy.
admin_audit_description: Conduct audits and tests on the system.
admin_audit_content: This is the content for the audits and tests page.
admin_logs_content: This is the content for the system logs page.
admin_market_insights_content: This is the content for the market insights page.
admin_notifications_description: Send and manage notifications to users.
admin_notifications_content: This is the content for the manage notifications page.
admin_dashboard_content: Welcome to the admin dashboard. Here you can manage the application.
admin_reports_content: This is the content for the usage reports page.
admin_security_content: This is the content for the security page.
admin_settings_description: Configure global settings for the application.
admin_settings_content: This is the content for the global settings page.
admin_users_content: This is the content for the manage users page.
modal_total_spent_desc: Breakdown of your spending by store for the current month.
modal_items_bought_desc: List of all items you have purchased in the current month.
modal_main_category_desc: Your spending distributed by category for the current month.
modal_potential_savings_desc: Analysis of potential savings based on your purchase history.
dashboard_consumption_overview_desc: Your spending evolution over the last 12 months.
empty_state_no_chart_desc: As you add your purchases, this chart will show your spending evolution.
dashboard_top_expenses_desc: The items with the highest total value in your recent purchases.
empty_state_no_expenses_desc: Add your purchases on the 'Add Purchase' page to see your top expenses here.
family_settings_description: Manage your family members, preferences, and plan.
tab_history_desc: Track all changes made to your family settings.
coming_soon_history_desc: We are working on this feature. Soon you will be able to see the full history of changes here.
purchase_history_description: View and manage all your past purchases.
empty_state_no_history_desc: Your purchase history is empty. Add a new purchase to get started!
empty_state_no_recommendations_desc: As you use the app, we will generate personalized recommendations for you.
shopping_list_description: Manage your active shopping list, add items, and get smart suggestions.
add_purchase_description: Import a receipt via PDF or enter the details manually.
error_not_logged_in: You must be logged in to perform this action.
error_saving_purchase: There was an error saving your purchase. Please try again.
settings_description: Manage your profile, preferences, and privacy.
privacy_delete_data_desc: This action is irreversible. All your purchases, lists, and settings will be permanently deleted.
privacy_delete_data_note: This action cannot be undone. You will lose all your data.
privacy_delete_data_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete all your data?
privacy_delete_data_confirm_desc: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. All your information will be lost.
privacy_delete_account_desc: This action is irreversible. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.
privacy_delete_account_note: Your account will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
privacy_delete_account_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
privacy_delete_account_confirm_desc: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. You will lose access to your account and all its data.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
signup_description: Fill in the details below to start using ShopWise.
empty_state_no_modal_data_desc: There is no information to display here yet. As you add purchases, this area will be populated.
premium_feature_desc_consumption: Upgrade your plan to get detailed AI-powered analysis of your consumption patterns.
modal_analysis_loading: Our AI is analyzing your data... Please wait.
preferences_form_success_message: Your preferences have been saved successfully!
preferences_form_error_generic: An error occurred while saving your preferences.
preferences_form_family_size_desc: This information helps our AI provide more accurate suggestions.
market_form_toast_added_desc: {{marketName}} has been added to your favorites.
market_form_toast_moved_ignored_desc: {{marketName}} has been moved to the ignored list.
market_form_toast_moved_favorites_desc: {{marketName}} has been moved to your favorites.
market_form_toast_removed_desc: The store has been removed from your family's lists.
market_form_add_new_desc: Add a new store to your list of favorites. You can also add stores from your purchase history.
market_form_favorites_desc: Stores you frequently shop at. Price comparisons and suggestions will be prioritized for these stores.
market_form_ignored_desc: Stores you don't want to see in your recommendations or comparisons.
plan_form_description: Choose the plan that best suits your family's needs.
plan_form_free_desc: For those who want to get organized.
plan_form_premium_desc: For those who want to save smart.
active_list_popover_desc: A quick view of your current list.
add_item_placeholder: Add an item to the list...
error_getting_suggestions_desc: Could not get suggestions from the AI. Please try again.
suggestions_based_on_history: Based on your history, you might also need:
import_from_pdf_desc: Select the PDF file of your electronic receipt (NFC-e) to automatically import all items.
scan_success_desc_pdf: PDF data extracted successfully. Please review the items below before saving.
scan_error_desc_pdf_detailed: Could not extract data from the PDF. Please check if the file is a valid NFC-e receipt and try again.
edit_item_description: Make changes to the product details below. Click save when you're done.
toast_error_generic: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
delete_confirmation_code_prompt: To confirm, please type <1>{{code}}</1> in the box below.
preferences_form_description: Customize the application's appearance and behavior.
preferences_form_push_notifications_desc: Receive notifications about suggestions and alerts.
profile_form_linked_accounts_desc: Connect your social accounts for easier login.
profile_form_success_account_linked_desc: Your account has been successfully linked.
profile_form_change_password_desc: For your security, we recommend choosing a strong password.
